entry.title: was accused in 2018 of spying on the building (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that after erecting the African Union headquarters (pictured), the Chinese government was accused in 2018 of spying on the building for five years?

entry.title: Big Brother (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the hook and concept of the song "Big Brother" was conceived by Kanye West in an elevator ride?

entry.title: Kalle Rovanperä (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Kalle Rovanperä became the youngest podium finisher in 2020, the youngest event winner in 2021 and the youngest world champion in 2022 at the World Rally Championship?

entry.title: are in cemeteries (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that many surviving remnants of North American prairie grasslands are in cemeteries?

entry.title: Appa Jalgaonkar (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Indian harmonium player Appa Jalgaonkar stopped singing due to puberty?

entry.title: chapters of 2 Maccabees (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the chapters of 2 Maccabees contain some of the earliest statements of belief in a bodily resurrection in Judaism?

entry.title: Charles Grobe (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Charles Grobe wrote the "Lincoln Quickstep" in honor of Abraham Lincoln?

entry.title: age of hole-discovery (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the 1980s were the "age of hole-discovery" in yaoi erotica?
